body:
Hello

For the next week I will be out of school because of Thanksgiving break (#Murica) and so I have decided to answer ALMOST every question that anyone wants to ask me. So yea.... Ask me ALMOST anything.  If the question is something that I feel doesn't need answering or is something I'm not ok with answering, that's it is ask me almost anything.

now that that's out the way. Shoot

~ GrapeSmoothie
